text: Ksenia Sergeevna Garanina (, ; born 17 April 1997) is a footballer who plays as a forward for Shirak-Homenmen. Born in Russia, she represents the Armenia women's national team. ==International career== Garanina capped for Armenia at senior level in a 1–1 friendly draw against Lithuania on 6 March 2020. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Russian women's footballers Category:Sportspeople from Udmurtia Category:People from Votkinsk Category:Russian Women's Football Championship players Category:Russian emigrants to Armenia Category:Naturalized citizens of Armenia Category:Armenian women's footballers Category:Armenia women's international footballers
title: Ksenia Garanina
